title.rendered: U.S. Citizen Town Hall Tamale – September 10

content.rendered:
The U.S. Embassy in Ghana is pleased to announce that a consular officer will be in Tamale on September 10, 2019 to meet with U.S. citizens in the area and to answer questions about U.S. citizen consular-related issues.

Capacity for the town hall will be limited so please email ACSAccra@state.gov to confirm your interest and/or request more specific information about the location and schedule. In your email please provide your name, passport number, and phone number.

Even if you are unable to join for this event, you can find a wealth of information about U.S. citizen consular services at https://gh.usembassy.gov/u-s-citizen-services/. You may also always email ACSAccra@state.gov or call 030-274-1000 Monday through Thursday from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM, or Friday from 8:00 AM to 12:00 PM, with questions or concerns and our team will be happy to assist.
